text:
Hello, I am currently working with the language switcher module from the boiler template but it writes the complete country name is it shows "English" instead of "EN"

So I would like to show the 'data-language' instead of the full name.

Are there more display_mode settings? I can not get this to work.

This is de module code
```              {% module 'language-switcher' path='@HubSpot/language_switcher',
                label='Language switcher',
                display_mode='localized'
              %}```

Hi All,
I want us to create an API to pull when was the last time the CSM team spoke to every customer - this could be an email, call or meeting.
I should start with building a simple function that takes the last interaction per Deal - email/call/meeting. Need to pick a random deal and work with it OR create a sample deal for testing.
The next step will be to make sure every deal has a CSM associated with it and all client users are actually associated with the deal.
I need to use python to figure it out,  Any idea what I should follow and how to get this done?
it works like a charm! thanks again for your help <@U012DQVJY9F> :pray:

Hello all, do you know if you can change the url slug part of the ‘Language’ when the country code is set? For example I want any page set as ‘English - United Kingdom’ to have the URL /uk/ instead of /en-gb/
not possible, this is something that HubSpot handles automatically

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!

:alert::alert::alert: Solve this problem first for 200 points:
*Is there a way to copy form submission results as a ticket activity?*

Would anyone be willing to share some code with me for a Google reviews widget?   I want to use one on my personal website (not client related) but the free ones available online are killing performance!   I have tried elfsight and taggbox, but they are poorly coded and “pay to play”.  I suspect it is easy enough to code something with the google business reviews API.  Any help here!

Default functionality is that it is going to be a Contact activity (as you know), you could create the form as a Support Form which would automatically create a Ticket + thread an activity on the Ticket itself :-)
